root.description: OverviewFacade is an interactive drama that revolves around a married couple and one very bad night. It's a one-act interactive narrative story told through a first-person perspective. It is an AI-based art/research project created as an experiment in the advancement of electronic narrative.PlotYou play as a close friend to Grace and Trip, the married couple, and you watch as the events occur; while your actions effect the different outcomes. You visit the couple at their apartment for a get-together and it doesn't take long for things to go sour. Much drama ensues as the night goes on and the choices you make will change their lives forever.The game can be downloaded for free on PC/Mac HERE.
